title: Little Tiger Sees The World
store_description:
Story Synopsis:
Little Tiger had heard all about mountains, sun, and all other things in the world. He was not able to see it because he was too small to go see the world. But now he wanted to see it, and sneaks out for this purpose. With the help of a friend, he does see a lot. He also learns that he must be patient till he can grow up and see the world himself. 

Language : English
Categories : Action and Adventure, Animals and Nature, Morals and Values
Age groups : 3-5, 6-8

Award-winning app, MangoReader, brings its hit story Little Tiger Sees The World to the iPhone and iPad for free!
A fully interactive reading experience packed with Games,activities, learning puzzles and pictures.
Explore pictures, Hear the story read aloud, learn new vocabulary, and personalise the story with your own narration.

Looking for the perfect story for your child? Download MangoReader's Little Tiger Sees The World.

This short story offers the same wonderful quality you've come to expect from MangoReader full library. MangoReader’s  Little Tiger Sees The World is great option for bedtime reading or story time on-the-go. 

You can read the same story in our website too, here the link http://mangoreader.com/live_stories//Little-Tiger-Sees-The-World

Start Reading: 
- ENCOURAGE literacy skills with highlighted narration
- LEARN new vocabulary with tappable words and pictures
- RECORD your own narration & share it with others
- SHARE a story with your own voice and artwork
- TRACK reading progress and learning data

We'd Love To Hear From You!

SMART FEATURES THAT AID THE LEARNING PROCESS 

Some important features

- Games to engage and enhance the learning experience, like memory game, word search game, puzzle games, learning activities etc. for each story 
- Read-along word highlighting promotes word recognition among young readers 
- Top-notch illustrations keep kids entertained by letting their imaginations take over 
- Read on your own or follow along with expert narration, and record your own audio to personalize and share with friends 
- Multi lingual stories to learn languages and exposure to global cultures

- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period
-Please contact subscriptions@mangoreader.com for help with subscriptions
